Cabazon Dinosaurs

Location: Cabazon, CA Categories: Art & Sculpture, Unusual Buildings

About Cabazon Dinosaurs

Giant concrete dinosaurs, Dinny the Brontosaurus and Mr. Rex the Tyrannosaurus Rex, featured in Pee-wee's Big Adventure.
